name: Challenger Cubed
description:
Challenger^3 is a block racer game with hard levels that change their color scheme at every attempt. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Planned features:

- Level finish rewards.

-More levels

-Item shop (Raygun, Glue, Time looper, More...)

-Endless Mode

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Controls:

A - Go left

D - Go right

Exit - alt+f4

This is a prototype that will get the planned features and more if people like it.
